title: Finally after nearly five years. . . .
body:
I have ascended from Bronze to Silver!
http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Silver_zpsozj1lgez.png

All thanks to the Sun goddess herself!
http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Ranked1_zpsgbva0dyy.png
http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Ranked2_zpssaq28d0v.png

How does it work? Well it works simply,
http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/index_zpsiks0uf0j.png

So if you are playing Leona and are still stuck in Bronze. . . .
http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/wmkzd_zpsu9jvgnli.jpg

I wish the best of luck to everyone still in Bronze. I know Silver still isn't any good and it's still a low elo. But after nearly five years in Bronze it feels **GREAT** to be out of it! Now then everyone try to have fun, don't rage, and good luck!

And remember, if you are losing. . . .
http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/ezgif.com-add-text_zpsyuqwshj2.gif

(EDIT)
I win my first game in Silver and finally got the last token I needed to get to Mastery level 7!
http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/M7Leona_zpskaql2d3m.png

A movie was just announced a few days ago.

Congrats!

http://65.media.tumblr.com/f08b8ed93849c9b194413aae21681c03/tumblr_inline_nvlmqcKsCj1soi7l4_500.gif

Congrats, I was fortunate enough to escape Bronze Season 4, and now slowly climbing up to Gold this season, (took a break season 5)

Currently SIlver 2 :)
probably some boosted animal and thats why you are out of bronze

I have a solo badge to prove that I only play solo.

I literally refuse to play ranked with anyone I know.
Looks like someone doesnt praise the sun! Tsk tsk
Well, Gold next season, eh? ^^
prez da sun
oh god a weabo .. is out of his bronze cage ... look him up back asap

You obviously don't know what weeaboo means. It's means, someone who want's to forsake they're own culture to join that of Japan's.

I have no intention of moving to Japan and joining the Japanese culture. I am a United States citizen and proud of it, despite all the crap we have going on.

If you are going to call someone a weeaboo, then atleast know if they are, or are not one first.
don't worry i know what a weabo is, so yeah ur one of em
What you just posted was so stupid and immature that it actually hurts knowing that it and you exists. I'm going to take a guess and say you're in early Middle School, maybe late Elementary School.
hahahah riot have to protect your feeling from me hahahahaa

You misunderstand. I'm not upset, or angry, or anything like that. I'm just disappointed. Disappointed that humans can be so truly pathetic.

It's my hope that in 15 years when you're an adult, you'll look back on your current attitude and cringe. Cringe the way I do when remember how I was as a child.

your last comment make me cringe so hard, yeah thats pathetic how human like you think they are god-a-like, bashing on someone because he his having some fun and don't take this non-sens board too much serious like you do. I cringed so hard when ir ealize you take this so seriously and you think you know that much about the world like you created it, oh well maybe someday you will understand and be ashame of your perceptionless pastself x.x i feel pity for you.
Oh, you are just **adorable**.
lol, can't even come back from this, i feel even more pitty for the poor education you've got.

This little back-and-forth has gotten boring. It has become nothing more than a waste of both of our time. What do either of us gain from prolonging this tedious exchange? 

Let's just call this a wrap and move on to something else.

If you choose to waste more of your time and reply, I'm not going to bother reading it. The words of a child hold no value to me.

> oh god a weabo .. is out of his bronze cage ... look him up back asap

I don't think you do, maybe you should look it up in a dictionary. We keep those in the bronze cages, but you'll need to unlock it first.

lawl, look up in a dictionary, well let me guess its been a long time you didn't look up into one yourself, like theses kind of words would be of any use to actualy be but in a serious dictionary, make sense. "LUL"

> look up in a dictionary

Look what up in a dictionary, you're missing a noun there. 

> well let me guess its been a long time you didn't look up into one yourself

Has it been a long time since i didn't look one up, or a long time since i did. If i didn't then how long it's been is a moot point. Your sentence fragments are contradicting themselves. 

> like theses 

I only have one thesis (that you aren't articulate enough to meaningfully converse with) put forth here, so the plural isn't appropriate here. 

> kind of words would be of any use to actualy 

actually\* 

> be but in a serious dictionary, 

Every word can be in a dictionary, no matter how serious you personally take it. That's how language works. 

> make sense.

I do thank you for noticing. 

> "LUL"

"LUL"
and again lil weab not making any sense, dictionary and grammar are not related get rekt.

I stand corrected, i do have multiple theses. 

1) You don't understand spelling. 

2) You don't understand grammer. 

3) You don't understand what weab/weabo means.
Dont fight this... its not worth speaking to heretic scum like him

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ZFTPrFR0,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-07-21T20:03:30.403+0000)

> I have no intention of moving to Japan and joining the Japanese culture. I am a United States citizen and proud of it, despite all the crap we have going on.

> If you are going to call someone a weeaboo, then atleast know if they are or are not one first.

what about otaku? im not saying u are but would that count?

Honestly I'm not sure about that one. I'm extremely picky about anime and don't actually watch much because of that.

Same goes for manga. I guess it depends on how much anime you would have to watch, and manga you would have to read to be considered an Otaku.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ZFTPrFR0,comment-id=0006000000020000,timestamp=2016-07-23T16:22:17.798+0000)

> 
> Same goes for manga. I guess it depends on how much anime you would have to watch, and manga you would have to read to be considered an Otaku.

i c well im like the same as u but I don't read any manga at all just watch some anime every once in a while

Congradulations! 
http://wanna-joke.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/funny-gif-elephant-party-hard.gif

I remember when I got out of Bronze, and I thought I made it out of elo hell. I was wrong lol. Silver is Bronze with more tryhards.

Thanks!

I've noticed that (atleast in lower silver) players will try out different comps and roam more than in some of the matches I've had in bronze. It may be that I haven't played too much in silver yet but there is definitely a difference in play.
That lich baneð
Use to use trinity, then after the crit chance was taken away I switched them out.
It also helps that the enemy team doesn't wear sunscreen ;)
I knew you could do it.

Thank you! Next up is to work my way to gold!

I still have a lot of room to improve though.
Damn, Daniel!

SSHHHHhh!

Only a few people on the boards know my name! Don't go spreading it!

Daniel o.o

Names are power!

Now i can control your every move!

As a support main i feel so much respect for you in being able to attain silver http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/le-miiverse-resource/images/6/65/Crying_clap_gif.gif/revision/latest?cb=20160216225307 #unboosted
**gratz and gl on reaching Gold before the season end! The victorious skin could be {{champion:89}}!**
If it is... QQ
Congrats, but let me say silver isnt gonna give you an easy time either. I got through silver 5 and 4 in about 15 games but i only just got out of silver three and that took me around 35 games.
Well that is the point. Higher skilled people will be in higher tiers, and thus you will face better players the higher you go.
Leona is the champ I'll use to climb when I eventually start ranked
She's easy to pick up and is fun to play. I hope you do well when you get into ranked!
